info.title: my-sklearn-service
info.description: API specification for the Azure Machine Learning service my-sklearn-service

get.description: Simple health check endpoint to ensure the service is up at any given point.

200.description: If service is up and running, this response will be returned with the content 'Healthy'

default.description: The service failed to execute due to an error.

post.description: Run web service's model and get the prediction output

parameters.name: serviceInputPayload
parameters.description: The input payload for executing the real-time machine learning service.

200.description: The service processed the input correctly and provided a result prediction, if applicable.

default.description: The service failed to execute due to an error.
